title: Bug 45145 - Second window comes to front when using first
description: When switching from another application to one Eclipse window and clicking on a docked view or perspective, the other window comes to the front over other applications' windows.
OB: When I switch from another application to one Eclipse window and then click on a docked view or perspective, the other window comes to the front, obscuring my other applications' windows.
EB: The expected behavior is that unless I click on the Eclipse dock icon, a window should only come to the front when I explicitly click on it, or if some behavior takes me to a widget in the other window.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Have multiple applications open alongside Eclipse.
2. Switch from another application to the Eclipse window.
3. Click on a docked view or perspective within Eclipse.
4. Observe that the other Eclipse window comes to the front over other applications' windows.
